images.title: Chasing rainbows
images.caption: National Find a Rainbow Day
images.desc: Happy National Find a Rainbow Day!  These colorful natural marvels appear when light strikes water droplets, creating a natural prism effect. So, areas that have plenty of sunshine and showers are a good place to start your search.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
